original_title: Dinner & A Download featuring Ben Sargent
overview: Chef Ben Sargent (Cooking Channel’s Hook, Line & Dinner): Chef Sargent takes on a bevy of “Man vs. Nature” flicks with such hearty, sea-worthy fare as his signature That’s How I (Lobster) Roll and Survival Chowder. Featured Movies: Cast Away, Jaws, The Perfect Storm,
title: Dinner & A Download featuring Ben Sargent
